page.title: 15A Day at Redlynch School
page.content: I get up at 06.30, breakfast at 07.30 and arrive at school just before 09.00.School starts with a half hour assembly and after that we usually do mathematics, writng and formal work until lunch at 12.00 with a morning break at 10.30. Lunch break lasts until 13.30 and during that time we play rounders, touch and cricket and go to clubs run by the teachers. In the afternoon we do topic work, craft and sports until 15.30. Quite often Mr Spring reads to us and we frequently spend a period in silent reading. After school on Mondays I go to Salisbury Swimming Club from 18.00 to 19.00 and I usually go to bed and read until 21.00.
